item.title: Version 0.7.0-beta.4
item.description:
Installation

macOS App (Recommended)

  1. Download TermQ-0.7.0-beta.4.dmg
  2. Open the DMG and drag TermQ.app to your Applications folder
  3. Double-click to launch

Alternative: Zip Archive

  1. Download TermQ-0.7.0-beta.4.zip
  2. Unzip and move TermQ.app to your Applications folder

CLI Tool

The termqcli CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

  1. Open TermQ.app
  2. Go to TermQ → Settings (or press ⌘,)
  3. Click Install Command Line Tool

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • feat(ci): Implement aggregate job pattern for path-based CI checks by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/82
  • fix: v0.7.0 stabilization - Phase 0 (Build & Launch) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/83
  • fix: Improve keyboard shortcuts and window management by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/84
  • fix(settings): Path inputs and LLM prompt injection UX improvements by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/85
  • fix(security): Clear secrets from UI when encryption key is reset by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/86
  • feat: Show secret counts in encryption key reset warning by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/87
  • feat: Headless mode support for CLI and MCP by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/88
  • fix: Phase 4 stabilization - CLI/MCP installation and error handling by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/89
  • fix: Phase 5 - TMUX features backend selector UX by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/90
  • docs: Document branch protection and Claude Code review workflow by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/91
  • fix: Repair broken localization in all 40 language files by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/92
  • Fix SwiftLint style warnings (228 violations) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/93
  • fix(ci): Deploy appcast files to GitHub Pages for Sparkle updates by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/94
  • fix(sparkle): Fix Settings update button and improve release notes formatting by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/95

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.7.0-beta.3...v0.7.0-beta.4

item.title: Version 0.7.0-beta.1
item.description:
Installation

macOS App (Recommended)

  2. Open the DMG and drag TermQ.app to your Applications folder
  3. Double-click to launch

  2. Unzip and move TermQ.app to your Applications folder

CLI Tool

The termqcli CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

  2. Go to TermQ → Settings (or press ⌘,)
  3. Click Install Command Line Tool

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • test: Improve unit test coverage by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/49
  • feat: Add environment variables and secrets management by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/51
  • feat(ui): Add TMUX badge for terminals using tmux backend by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/52
  • feat(release): Add Developer ID signing and notarization by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/53
  • feat(security): Add security hardening for MCP, URL scheme, and per-terminal controls by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/50
  • fix(terminal): Fix PTY size synchronization with Auto Layout by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/54
  • feat(update): Add Sparkle auto-update framework integration by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/56
  • fix(window): Enforce single window to prevent blank terminals by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/57
  • fix(ci): Add workflow_dispatch trigger to release workflow by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/58
  • ci(claude): Add Claude Code GitHub Workflow by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/59
  • fix(window): Replace reactive window closing with proactive prevention by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/60
  • docs(claude): Consolidate CLAUDE.md with command file references by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/62
  • fix: improve TMUX backend labeling consistency by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/63
  • fix: preserve tmux sessions when deleting cards and improve recovery UX by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/64
  • feat: add global default working directory and backend settings by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/65
  • ci(claude): Add persistent settings and comprehensive workflow documentation by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/66
  • feat: Add reusable UI components for settings improvements (PR #1/8) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/67
  • feat: Add SharedToggle component and reorganize settings tabs (PR #2) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/70
  • docs: improve workflow documentation visibility and enforceability by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/69
  • PR #3: Environment Tab Integration by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/71
  • feat: Complete Settings UI improvements (PR #4/8) - Tab navigation and tags editor by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/72
  • feat: apply PathInputField and SharedToggle to Terminal settings (PR #5/8) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/73
  • feat: improve terminal editor with Prompts tab and better components (PR #6/8) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/74
  • PR #7: Final Polish - StatusIndicator & Settings View Extraction by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/75
  • PR #8: Fix Badge Wrapping on Terminal Cards (Final PR) by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/76

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0-beta.1

item.title: Version 0.6.4
item.description:
[!WARNING] The 0.6.x builds are quite unstable, I learned a good lesson here about getting a bit too carried away on how easy it is to ship features with Claude. Shipping, features and fixes that on the surface were working, but when you started trying to use TermQ as your base tool showed up as not quite ready yet.

Installation

macOS App (Recommended)

  1. Download TermQ-0.6.4.dmg
  2. Open the DMG and drag TermQ.app to your Applications folder
  3. Double-click to launch

Alternative: Zip Archive

  1. Download TermQ-0.6.4.zip
  2. Unzip and move TermQ.app to your Applications folder

CLI Tool

The termqcli CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

  1. Open TermQ.app
  2. Go to TermQ → Settings (or press ⌘,)
  3. Click Install Command Line Tool

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.6.3...v0.6.4

item.title: Version 0.6.1
item.description:
Installation

macOS App (Recommended)

  1. Download TermQ-0.6.1.dmg
  2. Open the DMG and drag TermQ.app to your Applications folder
  3. Right-click and select "Open" on first launch (required for unsigned apps)

Alternative: Zip Archive

  1. Download TermQ-0.6.1.zip
  2. Unzip and move TermQ.app to your Applications folder

CLI Tool

The termqcli CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

  1. Open TermQ.app
  2. Go to TermQ → Settings (or press ⌘,)
  3. Click Install Command Line Tool

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termqcli /usr/local/bin/termqcli

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • perf(help): Optimize Help images with pngquant compression by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/41
  • fix(help): Fix Bundle.module crash when opening Help in installed app by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/42
  • fix(terminal): Fix Restart/Close Session behavior in tab view by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/43
  • fix(tabs): Prevent tab header layout shift from spinner by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/44
  • fix: Guard focus management during mouse drag to protect text selection by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/45
  • fix(help): Reorganize Help topics into sections with headings by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/46
  • fix(tmux): Kill tmux sessions when deleting cards and add Kill Session option by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/47
  • fix(ux): Add backend restart hint and reorder session menu items by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/48

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

item.description:

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • feat(i18n): Add full localization support with 40 languages by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/27
  • chore(ci): Consolidate CI/Makefile for local-CI parity by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/30
  • refactor: Tech debt cleanup and code quality improvements by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/31
  • feat: Add LIVE badge for background terminal sessions by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/32
  • feat: Add Kill Terminal option for stuck/unresponsive terminals by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/33
  • fix: Improve bell notification reliability and add Dock badge by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/34
  • fix(board): Correct same-column card reordering index calculation by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/35
  • feat(tabs): Add + button to tab bar for creating new terminals by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/36
  • feat: Add duplicate terminal context menu option by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/37
  • feat(data): Add backup, restore, and uninstall features by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/38
  • feat(tmux): Add tmux backend with control mode, pane rendering, and metadata sync by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/39
  • fix(i18n): Fix localization for user-selected languages by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/40

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.5.2...v0.6.0

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • feat: v0.3.0 improvements by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/8

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

item.title: Version 0.2.1
item.description:
Installation

macOS App (Recommended)

  1. Download TermQ-0.2.1.dmg
  2. Open the DMG and drag TermQ.app to your Applications folder
  3. Right-click and select "Open" on first launch (required for unsigned apps)

Alternative: Zip Archive

  1. Download TermQ-0.2.1.zip
  2. Unzip and move TermQ.app to your Applications folder

CLI Tool

The termq CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

  1. Open TermQ.app
  2. Go to TermQ → Settings (or press ⌘,)
  3. Click Install Command Line Tool

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termq /usr/local/bin/

Checksums

See checksums.txt for SHA-256 checksums of all release artifacts.

What's Changed

  • fix: add pin toggle to board view and fix terminal CWD switching by @eyelock in https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/pull/7

Full Changelog: https://github.com/eyelock/TermQ/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

macOS App (Recommended)

CLI Tool

The termq CLI is bundled inside the app. To install it:

Or manually:

sudo cp /Applications/TermQ.app/Contents/Resources/termq /usr/local/bin/
